thread.title: Justin Bieber jokes about ex Selena Gomez’s new BF The Weeknd
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber jokes about ex Selena Gomez’s new BF The Weeknd

author: gcatolico
title: Justin Bieber jokes about ex Selena Gomez’s new BF The Weeknd
text:
Justin Bieber jokes about ex Selena Gomez’s new BF The Weeknd INQUIRER.net / 09:27 AM February 14, 2017 A post shared by Justin Bieber Updates™ (@justinbiebertracker) on Feb 12, 2017 at 8:28pm PST ADVERTISEMENT 
Justin Bieber has trolled out his ex-girlfriend Selena Gomez and her rumored new fling, The Weeknd, with his sarcastic mode on spot. 
Despite being nominated four times, the “Cold Water” singer skipped the 59th Annual Grammy Awards on Monday and rolled down the streets to film himself on Instagram, which were uploaded on a fan account . When his friend Alfredo Lopez asked him what was his “favorite song of the moment,” he answered that he fancied “Starboy,” The Weeknd’s record-breaking tune last year. 
“Oh, s**t, that was funny,” Bieber’s friend blurted out, to which Bieber responded, “We gotta end it now, you all…that was too funny.” In another comic clip, 22-year-old Bieber stretched his legs while listening to “Starboy.” A post shared by Justin Bieber Updates™ (@justinbiebertracker) on Feb 12, 2017 at 8:25pm PST 
He was nominated for the Grammy’s for Song of the Year and Best Pop Solo Performance for his acoustic track “Love Yourself,” and Album of the Year and Best Pop Vocal Album for Purpose. 
The Weeknd is currently dating singer-actress Selena Gomez, who was Bieber’s former flame for two years. Gomez and The Weeknd were sighted hanging out in Italy and photographed smooching outside an Italian restaurant in California recently. 
Last month, TMZ reported that Bieber threw plenty of shade at his fellow Canadian, emphasizing that he could not “swallow” his rap songs. “Hell no, I can’t listen to a Weeknd song,” Bieber told the news site. “That s**t’s whack.” Gianna Francesca Catolico RELATED STORIES
